myself.name: I'm Davis,
myself.job: a developer who loves UI/UX design.

paragraph.1: I am a front-end developer who focuses on the UI/UX bits.
paragraph.2: I became a front-end developer because I fell in love with the visual aspects of technology. That is, I found working on the user interface both very fun and challenging.
paragraph.3: Speaking of the front-end, I love all of these modern frameworks and libraries: Angular, React & Svelte.
paragraph.4: I like Angular for the structure, React for the ecosystem, and Svelte for the ease of use and fun.
